name: Peeridea, Inc.
description: Operator of an online marketplace intended to serve software developers to grow through live mentorship and virtual events. The company's platform connects developers with experts for on-demand one-is-to-one help by utilizing screen sharing, video, and text chat, in order to replicate for users the experience of having a mentor for code reviewing, debugging, and online programming, enabling users to receive an improved remote hiring service and enhance their skills.
one_liner: Operator of an online marketplace intended to serve software developers to grow through live mentorship and virtual events.
